about: Specialist in creative, experiential web sites, games and applications.

I love to push the limits of the technologies at hand. I write robust, performant JavaScript and CSS, based on proven design patterns and guided by the [KISS](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/KISS_principle), [DRY](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don't_repeat_yourself) and [YAGNI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/You_aren't_gonna_need_it) principles.
My work has won over 60 major awards from the Webby Awards, Cannes Lions (Grand Prix, Goldx3), FWA (SOTY, SOTMx2), Awwwards and D&AD.
